name: The Resourceful Hunt
description:
Game for GMTK - 2019

----

You've just landed on an island to defeat the monster lurking in the cave. Luckily, you've come equipped with society's newest advancement, the Multitool™️! With this amazing and powerful tool, you are able to harvest the world's resources to your heart's content! Be careful though, as the Multitool™️ only has a limited amount of durability. You don't need to worry about that though, the kingdom has  sent an entire ship full of them- oh, wait, no, that ship just sank. Well, I guess you just have the one! Use it wisely.

----

Controls:

Harvest Resource - hover over resource and press E

Use Crafting Table - press E near the crafting table 

Enter Cave - press E near the cave

Attack - Left click

Change Weapons - Scroll wheel or 1 and 2

Open Inventory - tab

Equip Weapons and Armor - Click on an item in your inventory

----

Your single tool only has 30 durability, as can be seen at the bar on the bottom left. Once you run out of durability, you won't be able to gather anymore resources. Make sure you don't enter the cave without a weapon, or you wont be able to fight back ;)

----

Resource Cost:

Wood - 1 durability

Bronze - 2 durability

Steel - 3 durability

Ruby - 4 durability

Amethyst - 5 durability
